Reviews.Title: “Hit the spot!”
Reviews.Author: awhiz
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this property one night on our way through Indiana. We arrived near midnight; front desk was smiling and waiting for us. We were upgraded from two doubles to a King suite. Room had a nice layout. We slept quick; enjoyed breakfast; and hit the road before 9.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service!”
Reviews.Author: Darin M
Reviews.Content: I had a glitch with my reservation through Expedia and the General Manager at the Farifield took the bull by the horns and really went out of her way to take care of it. I would definitely stay there again and would recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: “Fairfield Needs a Facelift”
Reviews.Author: BlueMarlinDave
Reviews.Content: Typical no frills Fairfield located close to the Indianapolis Airport. I decided to stay here due to an early monrning flight. I was met with great service at the front desk and upgraded to a King Suite upon check in. The hotel is dated and needs a facelift. It is showing some age and wear. Otherwise, I cant fault the service or location.

Reviews.Title: “Good but not quite up to expectations”
Reviews.Author: sba001
Reviews.Content: I stay at Marriott properties fairly frequently and am usually not disappointed. While overall it was a good value considering the rate that I paid, the property is showing some wear & tear. The sink had a rust spot in it and the grout in the tub/shower was discolored. While not a big deal it was unexpected from a Marriott. There was a loud a/c compressor (?) outside that came on intermittently and was distracting when trying to fall asleep. But other than those items the room was clean, the staff was friendly and the breakfast was good. If you need to be in this area and get a good rate then I would recommend this hotel as long as you temper your expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Good night's sleep, good breakfast. Nice staff. Easy access to airport.”
Reviews.Author: NebraskaJack
Reviews.Content: As usual, Fairfield Inn (Marriott) is one of the few brands that I find I can completely rely upon. Shuttle to airport is convenient. Rooms are clean and relatively spacious. Breakfast is decent, and overall the place is a good value. If you are looking for a good restaurant nearby, I highly recommend "The Library." The Pork Chops are memorable, and they go well with an Australian Shiraz such as Konunga Hill.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: burkehouse
Reviews.Content: Stopped here for the night on our way through Indiana. Made our reservation about 6 pm on the Marriott mobile site (which works great!). Arrived about 9 pm and the front desk clerk upgraded us to a suite for being Marriott Rewards members. Got up to the room and it was very clean everywhere except behind the nightstands. While I went down to get our things my husband found a half-eaten smelly old hamburger behind one of the nightstands. It looked to have been there awhile. We were both too tired to even complain about it, so we just left a note for housekeeping (after my brave husband put it in the trash). Everything else was perfect - exactly what I expect from a Marriott brand hotel. Got a great night sleep and a good breakfast before taking off early the next morning. I will stay here again on my way through.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable hotel by the airport”
Reviews.Author: mgottlieb26
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel because of its proximity to the airport and the free shuttle service. I was pleasantly surprised with the hotel. It's nothing fancy but the service was great from the front desk staff to the shuttle driver. Shuttles run every half hour and it's less than a 10 minute drive to the airport. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the hotel itself was in pretty decent shape. The gym wasn't anything special (a few machines in a tiny room) but it did the job. Free breakfast was fine - waffles, oatmeal and bakery items - and well stocked. Nice hotel for the price and location. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Service, Nice Room”
Reviews.Author: mamabear3124
Reviews.Content: This is located in an industrial area and had me a bit concerned. The staff was great. The room was nice and clean. The bed was very comfortable. There were some sort of sports teams there, so it was noisy and the breakfast area was swamped. There is no hot tub, which I had looked forward to. Other than the location, I would reccommend this property. It is a good deal for the money. We did have trouble with parking in the handicap area. There was at least 8 to 12 " of ice and snow in those areas. Extremely dangerous, especially for people without good balance.

Reviews.Title: “was convenient for the old airport location”
Reviews.Author: djtimmy
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this property a couple times. Last time I stayed here it was for a few nighte because it was close to the airport and one of the places where I was travelling for business. The property is fine I but was unable to get a good night's sleep. This is due to the fact that the access road to a run down apartment complex runs past the hotel and you hear clunkers with loud exhausts driving in and out all night long. Switched to a different hotel for the remainder of my stay, and won't consider this property in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mikehettmann
Reviews.Content: Location is immediately off 465, in fact you can see it from the bottom of the exit. Staff was quick and kind. Checked room before bringing the bags in, clean behind the dresser, clean under the bed, sheets were clean, bathroom was clean, checked mattress for signs of bedbugs and it was so clean it looked new. Hotel was quiet overall. Only heard two planes go overhead. Breakfast was a nice sampling of bakery, waffles, fruit, etc. Internet access in the room was good. Only thing I didn't like about the hotel was the workout room was extremely small.

Reviews.Title: “older property at airport but clean with quality staff”
Reviews.Author: chamomilegardens
Reviews.Content: First off, I must admit that I stayed here by purchasing the room with a discount bidder. For the price I paid, it was well worth it. However, the advertised price that you would pay on the Marriott might not be a bargain for this older property in a limited part of town. There are older homes on one side of the hotel directly behind the parking and a closed Schlotzsky's deli on the another. If you are looking to dine out nearby, your options in the immediate area are a small, unimpressive selection of places like the Waffle House and Denny's . However, downtown is just a 12-minute drive away. You do get free wifi, free parking, free breakfast and a free airport shuttle at this hotel. The breakfast was well appointed from healthy cooked oatmeal to yogurt, a waffle maker, fresh fruit, English muffins, toast and more. (Jimmy Dean sandwiches are also available.) The room was clean with a comfortable bed. The air conditioner had an odd smell but everything from the bedspread to the curtains appeared fresh. The small pool was clean but showed some signs of cosmetic wear. The staff had standard bath towels laid out at the pool for use after a swim. All the staff were friendly and helpful. Good tasting coffee was kept out, along with fresh fruit, which was a welcomed touch since more eclectic dinner dining was a distance away.

Reviews.Title: “Served Its Purpose Well”
Reviews.Author: michtraveler1969
Reviews.Content: This Fairfield Inn was fairly typical for the chain. The room was rather small but very clean. The bed was comfortable with quality bedding. The bathroom was clean with a great showerhead and water pressure. The towels provided were small and should have had a grit rating on them. Washcloths, handtowels and bath towels were in general thin and probably should be replaced. The free high speed internet was just that, fast and free.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Close to the Airport”
Reviews.Author: MTCSS
Reviews.Content: I spent a night at this Fairfield, which is conveniently located near the airport. Check in went quickly and the front desk personal was very pleasant. I was upgraded to one of the suites that were available. The room and bathroom were very clean. The suite included a lounge area with a refrigerator, couch and TV while the sleeping area had a very comfortable bed and another TV. The bathroom had the normal amenities of soap and shampoo along with a coffee maker with 2 packets of regular and decaf coffee. Breakfast was included with the rate, which included bagels, fresh fruit, yogurt, muffins, coffee and juices. I would stay here again if in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Good Budget Hotel at Indy Airport”
Reviews.Author: garedsoxfan
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in late Dec 2007, Upon arrival, the staff was very helpful. The room was very clean, free WIFI, good work desk, and had a comfortable bed, My only complaint was that there was no fridge or microwave in room. My only other complaint was that the pool was a bit cold to swim in. The clerk said that the heater moter must be broken. Also, no hot tub in pool area, A very big plus for them was that let me have a late check out, 2 pm, so I did not have to sit at the airport for several hours. If I have to stay near the Indy airport again, I will stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great budget find”
Reviews.Author: 2Midwest
Reviews.Content: Friendly, helpful staff. Near airport. Reasonable rates. Free shuttle to airport. First room: needed vacuming. Second room: great. Consistent Marriott quality....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: ronlord
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night - no exit for the road it is on, you kind of have to loop around from the next exit to get to the hotel. This is a newer hotel, our room was immaculate. Pool looked great as did the fitness room, although we didn't use either. Breakfast in the morning was free and very good selection. The Sholotsky's deli in front of the hotel is closed which was a slight disappointment. We ate at the Indy's restaurant across the street which was OK.

Reviews.Title: “hot tub grossout”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Granted, I took one of the last rooms and it was quite last minute and late...but it was so bad I left the hotel at Midnight to find a new hotel. The staff was quite nice and accomadating. The hotel is quite old and dated. I ended up with a Hot Tub room for $119 / night. The hot tub is 4 feet away from the bed (which was old and uncomfortable). I was heading to sleep at 10:45 when a loud noise (sounded like a freight train) started and my bed began to vibrate. Turns out that the pipes for the hot tub in the adjacent room are in my room (and are 4 feet from my head.) I called the front desk to see when the man next door needed to turn off the tub and there is not a time (even though the pipes are located in my room). I could hear plenty through the walls that I didn't want to hear. The rumbling and noise continued on and off for over an hour - which is when I decided to leave. The staff was nice and didn't charge me for the room. Until they renovate and insulate the walls...I won't be going back.

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected Guests in Room”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We checked into the Indianapolis Airport Fairfield Inn. The desk clerk was pleasant as was the entire staff during our one night (we did the Park and Fly Package). Our first room had ants- both live and dead ones. The dead ones were all along the wall- the live ones we killed were by the air coditioner. I went to the desk and we were promptly moved to a second room (next door to the first...at this point they took 40% off my bill and apologized several times). The second room still had ants...dead and alive. Back to the desk...another apology and new room...this one 3 floors up. There were still a few ants, but after moving 3 times in 30 minutes with 2 children we stayed in our room with the ants. Other than ants the rooms were spotless. I understand ants can be anywhere, but you could see the edge where housekeeping had missed them in the cleaning. After talking to the manager after our return I was credited the full amount back to my account. The location was great, staff was nice but be careful of uninvited guests!
